snippet: The Chinese ambassador to the United Nations on Wednesday criticized the Japanese prime minister’s recent visit to a controversial shrine as an “affront to international justice.”
abstract: Liu Jieyi, Chinese ambassador to the United Nations, criticizes Japanese prime minister’s visit to a controversial shrine as an 'affront to international justice'; shrine honors Japan’s war dead, including some convicted war criminals.
lead_paragraph: The Chinese ambassador to the United Nations on Wednesday criticized the Japanese prime minister’s recent visit to a controversial shrine as an “affront to international justice.”

headline.main: Chinese Official Criticizes Japanese Shrine Visit

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject
